dcterms:creator: Iro Armeni
Sasha Sax
Amir R Zamir
Silvio Savarese
dcterms:description: S3DIS contains 271 rooms divided into 6 large areas, with each room corresponding to a point cloud containing medium-sized 3D points. It has 10 room types and 13 point categories suitable for point cloud semantic segmentation tasks.
dcterms:title: S3DIS

dcterms:creator: Timo Hackel
N. Savinov
L. Ladicky
Jan D. Wegner
K. Schindler
M. Pollefeys
dcterms:description: Semantic3D is a large-scale point cloud classification benchmark containing 15 point clouds and 8 classes for training, with each point cloud containing up to 108 points.
dcterms:title: Semantic3D
